game_description: Play the drums like a rock hero, and survive in hell fighting against demons and their boss! Characteristics: -Real Rock! Hard rock, heavy metal, Nu metal, among others. A wide variety of rock, with original music or hit groups! -Stylish and crazy graphics, with a brutal finishing level -TRUE Drums Set! A drums set that you will have to play and you can customize! -More than 4h of only CAMPAIGN! Plus all the extras! -Dozens of unlockables! Drumsticks, drums, songs... -Intuitive gameplay for everyone. No dizziness. Play in a chair. - Feel the rock n roll with advanced levels, make flourishes with the sticks and master the drums. -PHASE enemies and boss, special levels and different worlds to discover. -Online Ranking! Compete against your friends and beat their scores. -Musical versions of other videogames!! Watch out! -4 levels of difficulty! For all levels and with a fair progression!
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), German, German (Switzerland), Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Russian (Ukraine), Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
review_5: I find the flying demon/bats to be pretty distracting and would love the option to simplify them into just a coloured sphere or something similar. Also more popular songs and I will be happy to throw my money at you.. keep up the good work devs
